title: Grouping living things
brief_description: How do we classify the diversity of life? An animated Linneaus narrates the history of classification from Aristotle to his Systems Naturae, Phylum, and Class Order family. The film briefly explains how a scientist classifies and organism and gives many examples. Suitable for use in a general science course.
